title: Serious Player Looking for a chance
body:
Hey guys, it may look pretty stupid coming from someone in silver at the moment, but im really looking for some serious players that will give me at least a chance to prove myself in a team or duo or even subing in when someones away, i have played up to silver one on my smurf but never really ranked much on my main, ive been playing since beta and have never stopped playing , 75 percent of the time i always play with gold 1+ which are my friends on smurfs i should say and occasionally new people i meet, and perform up to par, i main ADC at the moment and only play God tier champs like Jhin and Varus and occasionally Ezreal. Motivation is what i need and i will perform and not disappoint, every one says this but i really dont belong in bronze or silver and have never found anyone committed enough to duo with and try and climb. All im looking for is a chance which will be the up-most motivation and im always still learning but all im learning now is how to hit my head against the wall. Im cant be more serious and would love a chance to get on some coms as i hate not being able to discuss whats going on in the game and prove my worth ! :) Cheers ! 

I should also add, i do main ADC at the moment but can play any other role except for jungle just fine since my knowledge base spans over 6 seasons. 

PLEASE GIVE ME A CHANCE haha o.O 

Add me on my main BrySkuxx to talk about anything :)

replies.body: i believe in you dude go get em
bro i just added u on this account lets duo dia adc
